page.title: 20Sawbridgeworth-New Crossing.
page.content:
The burning issue affecting Sawbridgeworth in the Summer of 1985 is the new{automatic barriers}across the London-Cambridge Railway Line at Station Road.The railway crossing used to have gates,but now has automatic half barriers.These only come down on the on-coming traffic side of the road,leaving the other side open.People are worried that children,blind people and animals might unknowingly go on to the line and get killed.People have got up petitions and meetings have been held with railway officials,but so far nothing has been done about it.
The "Domesday" Text has been written by children from two schools: {Sheering C.of E.Primary School}and {Reedings J.M.School,Sawbridgeworth.
